# hockeystick

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hockeystick is to download and visualize essential climate change data

## Installation

You can install the development version of hockeystick from [https://github.com/cortinah/hockeystick](https://github.com/cortinah/hockeystick) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("cortinah/hockeystick")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(hockeystick)
## basic example code
```
